text: Knife Party is an Australian electronic dance music duo. Their first EP was 100 % No Modern Talking, which was released on December 12, 2011 through Beatport.100 % No Modern Talking at Beatport Knife Party was founded by Rob Swire and Gareth McGrillen from the band Pendulum. On May 28, 2012, Knife Party's second EP, Rage Valley was released.Rage Valley at Beatport Their single Antidote (Swedish House Mafia vs. Knife Party) was their most successful release so far. It debuted at Number 4 in the UK Singles chart.Antidote (Swedish House Mafia vs. Knife Party) at chartarchive.org == Discgography == === Studio albums === *Abandon Ship (2014) === EPs === *100% No Modern Talking (2011) *Rage Valley (2012) *Haunted House (2013) === Singles === *"Antidote" (Swedish House Mafia vs. Knife Party) (2012) *"Resistance" (2014) *"Begin Again" (2014) *"Boss Mode" (2014) == References == == Other websites == *Official website * Category:Musical groups established in 2011 Category:Australian musical groups Category:Electronic music groups Category:Musical duos Category:Musical groups from Western Australia Category:2011 establishments in Australia
title: Knife Party
